name: get-file-url
description:
Get a presigned URL to access a file. The URL is valid for 60 seconds and requires no authentication. Get file IDs from 'company files ls', 'person files ls', or 'opportunity files ls' commands.

⚠️ CLAUDE DESKTOP/COWORK LIMITATION: WebFetch cannot access userfiles.affinity.co due to domain sandbox restrictions. Use 'files read' command instead (e.g., 'company files read 123 --file-id 456') which returns base64-encoded content inline. This tool is still useful for Claude Code and other environments where WebFetch works.

fileId.description: ID of the file (from data[].id in files ls output)
